title: Toby Carvery
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Buffet, British, English, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chain of pub/restaurants - be warned that it's a carvery and is primarily meatstuff, but it's an option to go with non-veg diners. Offers vegetarian and vegan choices, including dessert; could also order a few sides to make a meal, like roast potatoes, stuffing, apple sauce, etc. Ask about butter use.
streetAddress: Bowers Park Business Estate, Earle Rd
